name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`BRANCH`,
t1.`CREATEBY`,
t1.`DEPT`,
t1.`DEPTNAME`,
t1.`ID`,
t1.`ORG`,
t1.`ORGNAME`,
t1.`PLAN`,
(
	CONCAT(
	t21.`name`,
	'/',
	t31.title,
	'[',
CASE
	
	WHEN t31.`begin` IS NOT NULL THEN
	t31.`begin` ELSE '' 
	END,
	'~',
CASE
		
		WHEN t31.`end` IS NOT NULL THEN
		t31.`end` ELSE '' 
	END,
	']' 
	) 
	) AS `PLANNAME`,
t1.`PRODUCT`,
t11.`code` AS `PRODUCTCODE`,
t11.`name` AS `PRODUCTNAME`,
t1.`PROJECT`,
t21.`NAME` AS `PROJECTNAME`,
t1.`UPDATEBY`
FROM `zt_projectproduct` t1 
LEFT JOIN `zt_product` t11 ON t1.`PRODUCT` = t11.`id`  
LEFT JOIN `zt_project` t21 ON t1.`PROJECT` = t21.`ID`
LEFT JOIN `zt_productplan` t31 ON t1.`PLAN` = t31.`ID`
